title: Magic number for VCP input source code
description: In main.rs:129, VCP code 60 should be a named constant: const VCP_INPUT_SOURCE: u8 = 0x60;

title: Cargo.toml uses invalid Rust edition 2024
description: Cargo.toml specifies edition = 2024 which doesn't exist. Should be edition = 2021.

title: Default USB IDs match all devices
description: Default values 0x0 for vendor/product ID will match all USB devices when no config is provided, triggering monitor switches on any USB activity. Should either require these values or use a safer default behavior.

title: Race condition in signal handling - handle_events blocks indefinitely
description: In main.rs:90-99, handle_events(None) blocks indefinitely, so the signal check is only reached after a USB event. Pass a timeout instead: usb_context.handle_events(Some(Duration::from_millis(100)))

title: Type alias DisplayId defined after use
description: In ddc.rs:46, DisplayId type alias is defined after it's used in structs. Move to top of file for clarity.

title: Fragile ddcutil output parsing
description: In ddc.rs:66-74, parsing assumes specific ddcutil output format. If ddcutil changes output, this breaks silently. Consider using --brief flag or regex with better error messages.

title: No validation for empty monitor config
description: If --monitor-config is empty, the program panics late in SwitcherConfig::new. Should validate early and provide a helpful error message.

title: Add SIGTERM handling for systemd
description: Systemd sends SIGTERM for graceful shutdown. Currently only SIGINT is handled in main.rs:108. Add SIGTERM to: Signals::new([SIGINT, SIGTERM])?

title: Use Rust doc comment style
description: In helpers.rs:5-17 and 31-34, doc comments use C-style /** */. Rust convention is /// for doc comments.

title: Blocking sleep in USB hotplug callback
description: In main.rs:144-147, sleep() inside the hotplug callback blocks libusb's event thread. This could cause missed events or timeouts. Consider spawning a thread or using async for the DDC commands.

title: Add rate limiting for USB events
description: Rapid USB connect/disconnect could flood DDC commands, potentially causing monitor issues. Consider debouncing or rate limiting USB events.

title: Add retry logic for DDC commands
description: DDC commands can fail transiently when monitor is busy. Consider adding retry with exponential backoff.

title: ddcutil exit status not checked
description: In main.rs:125-133, only checks if Command execution failed, not if ddcutil returned an error. Should check status.success() on the returned status.

title: Config file errors silently ignored
description: In main.rs:44-45, if config file exists but is unreadable (permissions issue), it falls back to CLI parsing without warning. Should warn the user.

title: Hex string parsing rejects decimal values
description: In helpers.rs:47-51, from_hex_string requires 0x prefix. Error message is vague. Consider also accepting plain decimal values for user-friendliness.

title: Non-deterministic HashMap iteration order
description: In ddc.rs:82-94, display configs are processed in arbitrary order due to HashMap. If DDC timing matters between monitors, use BTreeMap or IndexMap for deterministic ordering.
